sentence.Network_en: He prayed to God night and day to endue him with the spirit of holiness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他日夜祈求上帝赋予他虔敬的心.

sentence.Network_en: He prayed to God to endue him with wisdom.
sentence.Network_cn: 他祈求上帝赋予他智慧.

sentence.Network_en: Endue him with blessings, and send him your peace.
sentence.Network_cn: 祈神保佑, 让他安宁吧.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (also in the sense 'induct into an ecclesiastical living'): from Old French enduire, partly from Latin inducere 'lead in' (see induce), reinforced by the sense of Latin induere 'put on clothes'
